article_title: New Brunswick’s second COVID-19 case connected to first confirmed case, officials say
article_description: Dr  Jennifer Russell  the province s chief medical officer of health  said the presumptive case is a man between 50 and 60 years of age in the southeastern part of the province
article_content: FREDERICTON New Brunswick has a second case of COVID 19 and health officials say it s connected to another case that was confirmed earlier this week Dr  Jennifer Russell  the province s chief medical officer of health  said the presumptive case is a man bet   2656 chars
